Class AbstractEdgeState

  • java.lang.Object
    • vistra.framework.util.AbstractState

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BackEdgeState, CrossEdgeState, DiscardedEdgeState, ForwardEdgeState, SolutionEdgeState, UnexploredEdgeState, VisitedEdgeState

extends AbstractState
implements IState
